subject: Figure Skating
Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: Akiko Suzuki of Japan won the NHK Trophy in Sapporo, Japan, and Brandon Mroz of the United States became the first skater to land a quadruple lutz in international competition.
snippet: Akiko Suzuki of Japan won the NHK Trophy in Sapporo, Japan, and Brandon Mroz of the United States became the first skater to land a quadruple lutz in international competition.
